scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/GUITAToken.sol > flatten-contracts/GUITAToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/GUITAReferral.sol > flatten-contracts/GUITAReferral.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/GUITAMasterChef.sol > flatten-contracts/GUITAMasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/GUITALottery.sol > flatten-contracts/GUITALottery.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Timelock.sol > flatten-contracts/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Multicall.sol > flatten-contracts/Multicall.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChef.sol > flatten-contracts/SmartChef.sol && node flatten_fix.js
scripts.flatten-owner: truffle-flattener contracts/GuitaFactory.sol > flatten-contracts/GuitaFactory.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/GuitaRouter.sol > flatten-contracts/GuitaRouter.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/GuitaProfile.sol > flatten-contracts/GuitaProfile.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/GuitaPair.sol > flatten-contracts/GuitaPair.sol && node flatten_fix.js
